1313850.name: StarCrossed - Art Book & Comic
1313850.description:
Contigo Games is excited to present the Official StarCrossed Artbook and Comic! Take a behind-the-scenes look at the development of the game.


  • 44 pages of never before seen StarCrossed content!
  • 100+ illustrations and concept sketches by the StarCrossed art team!
  • 5 page prequel comic!
  • A closer look at 3D art, character portraits, and background illustrations!
  • Developer notes about character design, world lore, inspirations, gameplay planning, and more!

Contains spoilers for StarCrossed Story Mode.

You can access these books in PDF form by clicking the gear icon in your games library and clicking on "Browse local files".
1313850.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
